column5: I added a member map, and a hook called "similar topics" and soemthing else i can't remember. Anyway the map works. The "similar topics" shows ..well.. similar topics at the bottom of the thread. I am not all that keen on it..didn't seem to skin correctly...but I will leave it to you guys. It is collapsible anyway if you dont like it, just click ont he arrow in the header bar for it.
I like the members map Rick, it's good to see where everybody hangs their hats.  Will you also be able to have the locations put back in the avatars ??
I don't mind the similar topics but maybe put it under the fast reply box
Why are they all from November, 2006? ...and why do they seem to have nothing to do with the original topic?
yeah i wouldnt mind having the locations under the avatars back...  good job on everything so far though
hey rick i like the map. keep up the great work. this new board is looking better then the old board. the map is very informative too--- now i know why the g2g is at lakeair LOL i still luv ya TJ
my location is under my profile but not on the map..no biggie
You've got to enter your location. Click on the member map at the top right of the page.
The map's kinda neat. I wonder what Tennesseeguy is doing up in the frozen north. Hunting?  JF
